author: cms-sw
body:
following suggestion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/pull/1466
This is tested and sorts the tags here:
https://github.com/npc-data/PhysicsTools-NanoAOD/releases
like this:
V01-07-00
V01-06-01
V01-06-00
V01-05-00
V01-04-00
V01-03-00
V01-02-06
V01-02-05
V01-02-04
V01-02-01
V01-02-00
V01-01-00
V01-00-12
V01-00-11
V01-00-10
V01-00-09
V01-00-08
V01-00-07
V01-00-06
V01-00-05
V01-00-04
V01-00-03
V01-00-02
V01-00-01
V01-00-00
although the last release/tag is 01-02-06
title: Only sort tag names
